nodes.text: Spince was a male Human senator of the Galactic Republic and the Galactic Empire, who represented Corellia and the Corellian sector. After the Clone Wars, he secured a posting for his son, Mako, at the Imperial Space Academy. Upon Mako's expulsion from the Academy for blowing up the Mascot Moon, the senator provided his son with enough credits to start up a business of his own, however Mako instead used the money to start up his smuggling career.
